# isActivated

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether to display the system selection UI.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isActivated: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

Set this property to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] when you want the system to display the selection UI. Set the property to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] to hide the selection UI again.
title: isActivated
